items.summary: Convert the website to a Progressive Web App (PWA) by adding a web app manifest file with appropriate icons, theme colors, and display mode set to standalone, and register a service worker to enable offline capabilities and home screen installation on mobile devices

Create an About Us/Founder page displaying founder information including name (Anuj Saha), location (Bijapur, Chhattisgarh), contact number (7828226397), email (rohitmarpalli@gmail.com), and Instagram profile link (https://www.instagram.com/annujj_03_), with a WhatsApp icon that opens a direct chat to the founder's number when clicked

Implement automatic role detection in the backend to identify the founder account by matching the Internet Identity principal to the email rohitmarpalli@gmail.com, storing this mapping in stable storage, and exposing a backend function that returns whether the current caller is the founder

Create a dedicated Founder Admin Panel page visible only to the founder (identified by rohitmarpalli@gmail.com linked account) that displays all bike listings in the marketplace with options to edit or delete any listing regardless of ownership

Add a founder profile editor in the Admin Panel that allows the founder to update their details including name, address, contact number, email address, and Instagram profile link, with all changes persisted in the backend
Extend backend authorization rules to grant the founder account admin privileges allowing them to edit or delete any bike listing in the marketplace, not just their own
